item.title: Sleep Hacks: How to Sleep Better
item.description: This presentation on sleep hacking provides an overview of some of the variables that affect sleep. Understanding these variables provides insight into how to optimize your sleep so you can achieve a better sleep. I tried to include some less obvious sleep hacks as a precursor to my class: Sleep Hacking - How to Dominate Your Sleep in Less than A Week
item.content:encoded: This presentation on sleep hacking provides an overview of some of the variables that affect sleep. Understanding these variables provides insight into how to optimize your sleep so you can achieve a better sleep. I tried to include some less obvious sleep hacks as a precursor to my class: Sleep Hacking - How to Dominate Your Sleep in Less than A Week
item.author: Scottbrit@slideshare.net(Scottbrit)

media:content.media:title: Sleep Hacks: How to Sleep Better

item.title: The Return of Storytelling vs. Corporate Speak
item.description: Storytelling has become the “new black” in business communications. And for good reason. This deck shares some of the science and anecdotal evidence on why storytelling works. It also reminds us storytelling wins over corporate speak virtually every time (perhaps not in a quarterly earnings news release). All with a touch of levity.
item.content:encoded: Storytelling has become the “new black” in business communications. And for good reason. This deck shares some of the science and anecdotal evidence on why storytelling works. It also reminds us storytelling wins over corporate speak virtually every time (perhaps not in a quarterly earnings news release). All with a touch of levity.
item.author: thehoffmanagency@slideshare.net(thehoffmanagency)

media:content.media:title: The Return of Storytelling vs. Corporate Speak
media:content.media:description:
Storytelling has become the “new black” in business communications.
And for good reason.
This deck shares some of the science and anecdotal evidence on why storytelling works.
It also reminds us storytelling wins over corporate speak virtually every time (perhaps not in a quarterly earnings news release).
All with a touch of levity.
media:content.media:text: Storytelling has become the “new black” in business communications. And for good reason. This deck shares some of the science and anecdotal evidence on why storytelling works. It also reminds us storytelling wins over corporate speak virtually every time (perhaps not in a quarterly earnings news release). All with a touch of levity.

item.slideshare:embed: The Return of Storytelling vs. Corporate Speak from The Hoffman Agency

item.title: 10 ways spacecrafts teach better design
item.description: I came by the Akin’s laws for spacecraft design and they inspired me greatly. I also love sci-fi concept design and I had the opportunity to create a mix of two awesome things into something I hope readers will like. Share and keep the dream alive!

item.title: 52 Presentation Tips by SOAP
item.description: http://soappresentations.com/52_tips/ SOAP Presentations wants to help you achieve exceptional performances in 2013, so we’re giving you this eBook of 52 Presentation Tips: one for each week next year. item.title: 10 Wise Lessons I've learnt from Freelancing
item.description: A simple presentation I’ve put together highlighting some important lessons I’ve learnt in my short time freelancing. I hope these can help you with your own freelancing or business. I had all these written down as Post-it notes stuck to my office wall and I thought I’d give them a new life.
item.content:encoded: A simple presentation I’ve put together highlighting some important lessons I’ve learnt in my short time freelancing. I hope these can help you with your own freelancing or business. I had all these written down as Post-it notes stuck to my office wall and I thought I’d give them a new life.
item.author: thepresentationdesigner@slideshare.net(thepresentationdesigner)

media:content.media:title: 10 Wise Lessons I've learnt from Freelancing
media:content.media:description:
A simple presentation I've put together highlighting some important lessons I've learnt in my short time freelancing.
I hope these can help you with your own freelancing or business.
I had all these written down as Post-it notes stuck to my office wall and I thought I'd give them a new life.
media:content.media:text: A simple presentation I’ve put together highlighting some important lessons I’ve learnt in my short time freelancing. I hope these can help you with your own freelancing or business. I had all these written down as Post-it notes stuck to my office wall and I thought I’d give them a new life.
